amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the intelligence budget for fiscal year 1999 by 5 percent with the CIA Retirement and Disability Fund exempted from the reduction.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 2 in the Congressional Record of May 5, 1998 to reduce the total funding authorized in the bill by 5 percent.
